CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically rise above and fall below the cloud layer based on the rise and fall of action in the music.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_height

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: auto height MUST BE SET TO OFF. Manually control the height of the camera in the scene.
CONTROLS.NAME: manual_height

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flip entire scene over, turning it from a city to a starry sky, and from a flying over clouds to under water.
CONTROLS.NAME: flip_side

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Strafe camera back and forth by turning knob.
CONTROLS.NAME: horizontal_motion

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Change sun height in sky, resulting in deeper red sunset or white light from a high sun position.
CONTROLS.NAME: sun_position

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Change how fast you fly through the clouds. Higher is faster, lower is slower.
CONTROLS.NAME: speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn OFF to stop the generation of the city/stars and preserve FPS.
CONTROLS.NAME: city_fps
